en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Qianhai

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, will visit Qianhai in Shenzhen tomorrow (May 28) to attend the opening ceremony of the Court-Connected Mediation Center of the Shenzhen Qianhai Cooperation Zone People's Court and the first ever Hong Kong-related commercial mediation forum in Qianhai.

Mr Yuen will speak at the opening ceremony of the Court-Connected Mediation Center. Established by the Shenzhen Qianhai Cooperation Zone People's Court, the Court-Connected Mediation Center is responsible for mediation before and during litigation. The centre will introduce a neutral third-party evaluation mechanism for cases involving Hong Kong parties, under which a neutral third party will, according to the circumstances of cases, help clarify the applicable Hong Kong laws, the evidence needed and the possible verdicts from a neutral and professional point of view. As a result, both parties concerned can better identify and understand the Hong Kong legal issues involved so as to narrow the disputes between them. The parties can also make an informed decision on resorting to conciliation or other reasonable means to resolve disputes. The centre will engage Hong Kong mediators in mediation.

Jointly organised by the Shenzhen Qianhai Cooperation Zone People's Court, the Shenzhen Court of International Arbitration, the Hong Kong Chamber of Commerce in Shenzhen Qianhai, the Guangdong, Hong Kong and Macau Mediation Alliance, and the Joint Mediation Helpline Office, the Hong Kong-related commercial mediation forum will explore diversified models of dispute resolution and the latest developments of commercial mediation worldwide as well as in Hong Kong and Qianhai.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong in the evening on the same day.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師明日（五月二十八日）訪問深圳前海，出席深圳前海合作區人民法院（前海法院）訴調對接中心的揭幕儀式和首屆前海涉港商事調解論壇。
袁國強將於前海法院訴調對接中心的揭幕儀式上致辭。該訴調對接中心是由前海法院建立以負責訴前調解和訴中調解的機構。對涉港案件，中心將引入中立第三方評估機制，由中立第三方根據案件情況，從中立和專業角度查明案件適用的香港法律和所需要的證據及可能的判決結果，從而提高當事人鑑別和理解所涉及香港法律問題的準確性，縮小雙方爭議，並協助當事人選擇和解或其他合理方式解決糾紛。訴調對接中心還將引入香港調解員參與調解。
前海涉港商事調解論壇由前海法院、深圳國際仲裁院、深圳市前海香港商會、粵港澳商事調解聯盟及聯合調解專線辦事處合辦，將探討多元化糾紛解決機制、國際商事調解，以及香港和前海商事調解的最新發展。
袁國強將於同日晚上返港。
